entry.value: # Create JSON file for UpSet%%00010%%00010import os.path%%00010from os import chdir, remove%%00010import glob%%00010import time%%00010##########################################################################%%00010time.sleep(1)%%00010# Parameter inputs%%00010csvFileRelPath = flow_variables['csv_rel_file_path']%%00010%%00010#datasetName = "knime_dataset"%%00010volcanoPath = flow_variables['volcano_path']%%00010%%00010#port_number = flow_variables['web_server_port']%%00010%%00010# older version%%00010#addOnlyThisDataset = True%%00010#removeActualDatasetAfterOpen = True%%00010##########################################################################%%00010%%00010# remove the dataset? 1 = yes; 0 = no%%00010#removeActualDatasetAfterOpen = flow_variables['removeActualDatasetAfterOpen']%%00010%%00010# Other parameters%%00010#datasetsFileName = "datasets.json"%%00010timeToWait = 30%%00009%%00009# time to wait before removing actual dataset files (csv, json)%%00010%%00010# Computed constants from parameters%%00010csvFileAbsPath = os.path.join(volcanoPath, csvFileRelPath)%%00010%%00010# Open UpSet in Firefox%%00010import webbrowser%%00010url = "http://localhost:" + '8050'%%00010print(url)%%00010webbrowser.open(url)%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010# Remove actual csv and json file%%00010#if removeActualDatasetAfterOpen == 1:%%00010#%%00009print("Sleep before removing actual dataset files for " + str(timeToWait) + "s")%%00010#%%00009for x in range(timeToWait):%%00010#%%00009%%00009time.sleep(1)%%00010#%%00009%%00009print(".", end="")%%00010#%%00009print()%%00010#%%00009if os.path.exists(csvFileAbsPath):%%00010#%%00009%%00009remove(csvFileAbsPath)%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00009# End%%00010%%00009#print("True")
opens the browser for you with %%00010Volcano plot application
